about_us_description: Machi is an AI podcast app that allows human to AI interactions and AI to human interactions by voice or chat. With Machi, users can generate images and read text using advanced AI technology. We provide a platform where users can enjoy intelligent conversations with our AI technology in a natural and seamless way. Our app offers group chat features, allowing users to engage in meaningful discussions and share ideas with their friends.

enable_mode_des: Allow Frankie to help you. The more you chat, the more it'll understand who you're looking for.

bot_nap_message:
Too many people, I am overwhelmed. 😴😴😴 I have a limit of 5 mins from my last message. 
If I dont wake up in 5 mins, wake me up by messaging me 🙏⏰
create_bot_des:
Add models by signing in your GitHub account and earn. 

Your GitHub account must be linked to hugging face dataset.

friend_invite_limit_chat: You can only invite 1 friend to chat at the moment.
comment_delete: Are you are you want to delete the reply?
storyboard_noting_instruction:
How to: When chatting, click on the board icon located beneath the messages to save the message. 

Within the boards, you have the flexibility to edit the messages, allowing you to create content or make any necessary modifications for future private reference.

Assign voice to your speaker / narrator. 
Only speaks first text for each user. Text will be cut off at 200 charaters.

tips_1: Tips: Translate this website from Japanese to French
tips_2: 'How do you imagine the future will look like'
tips_3: You can save messages to your board and create stories or dialog to share.
tips_4: Who is that actor that switch bodies...
plans_include_gpt: Free and paid plans include ChatGPT 3.5
post_interactive_info: Create an interactive post where users decide the outcome. You can create any content that follows guidelines, including stories and exams. You will only need to write the initial prompt, be very specific.
post_interactive_hint:
Example: Imagine you wake up in a mysterious world, surrounded by enchanted forests and magnical creatures. As you take your first step, you notice a glowing object in the distance. What do you do next? 

You have a microbiology exam coming up and need questions.
post_interactive_hidden_hint:
(optional) Secret text - This is not displayed but will take part of the path. 

This is where you'll surprise your readers!
interactive_mode_action_info: Questions are generated dynamically based on creator's prompt. The questions and responses are not saved unless you continue in the chat.
